resources.string:
this app uses kotlin for devleopment 
 one of the screen is used to noted down incidents and their emergency level 
 another page is used for saving emergency contact numbers 
 another page is used to press button to do the needy like send sms 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 ,current location,image capture and sending...

string-array.name: about_page_array
string-array.item: this app uses kotlin for development
one of the screen is used to noted down incidents and their emergency level
another page is used for saving emergency contact numbers
another page is used to press button to do the needy like send sms current location,image capture and sending
